results.definition: the speech act of answering an attack on your assertions
examples: in defense he said the other man started it

results.definition: (sports) the team that is trying to prevent the other team from scoring
examples: his teams are always good on defense

results.definition: the defendant and his legal advisors collectively
examples: the defense called for a mistrial

results.definition: a defendant's answer or plea denying the truth of the charges against him
examples: he gave evidence for the defense

results.definition: a structure used to defend against attack
examples: the artillery battered down the defenses

results.definition: the justification for some act or belief
examples: he offered a persuasive defense of the theory

results.definition: the act of defending someone or something against attack or injury
examples: a good boxer needs a good defense
defense against hurricanes is an urgent problem

results.definition: the federal department responsible for safeguarding national security of the United States; created in 1947
an organization of defenders that provides resistance against attack
examples: he joined the defense against invasion

results.definition: (military) military action or resources protecting a country against potential enemies
examples: they died in the defense of Stalingrad
they were developed for the defense program

results.definition: (psychiatry) an unconscious process that tries to reduce the anxiety associated with instinctive desires

examples: sanitation is the best defense against disease
